title: Security IM definitions
description: The Security Information Model defines the semantics of access control and privacy setting for information in the EHR
$comments: Part of RM component, Release-1.0.4 version.

ACCESS_CONTROL_SETTINGS.title: ACCESS_CONTROL_SETTINGS
ACCESS_CONTROL_SETTINGS.description: Access Control Settings for the EHR and components. Intended to support multiple access control schemes. Currently implementation dependent.
